Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2007 02:41PM momofbb wrote: I had a Birad 4 mammogram on 10/6.  Took so long to get my records and get to specialist.  Saw radiologist last Thursday for biopsy of 2 spots, plus he found another.  Said he was sure they were DCIS malignant in those 2, so didn't want to bother the 3rd; would need a mastectomy to remove all 3.  Was very confident, but added of course he would make sure with the biopsy.  Biopsy came back benign!  He couldn't believe it.  I have a intraductal papilloma spot and a ductal epithelial hyperplasia without atypia.  Still thinks I will have to have the intraductal spot removed.  Now have the 3rd spot biopsied on 12/10.  If malig., possibly mastectomy since taking other spot too.  I'm not worrying until the biopsy is done. You never know, so please don't worry.  I worried and decided on what type of mastectomy,etc. I would choose.  Had told my teenage kids.  He was so absolutely certain.  You never know! I'm definitely not out of the woods, but it's a little better picture than he painted.  My prayers are with everyone.  Take care.
Posts.Title: Biopsy tomorrow Gale58 lvtwoqlt
